subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which of the following is NOT a famous fort in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में कौन सा नहीं शुभारत है ?
explanation_en: Meerpur Kshetra is not a fort. It is a tehsil located in Jhalrapatan district.
explanation_hi: Meerpur Kshetra एक तेजस्वाती स्थान है जो जल्रापाटन जिले में है।
